{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Mobile React Native - Full Stack Developer",
  "description": "Urban Hive Nigeria is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidate to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mobile React Native - Full Stack Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos (Remote)
Employment Type:&nbsp;Part-Time

Job Description


	We are looking for a Mobile React Native | Full Stack Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have the technical expertise and interpersonal abilities needed to build and maintain high-quality mobile applications.


Requirements
Technical Skills Required:


	Proficiency in React Native for mobile app development (iOS and Android).
	Experience with JavaScript and TypeScript.
	Familiarity with mobile development tools and libraries, such as Expo, Redux, or similar state management solutions.
	Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
	Experience with testing and debugging mobile applications.
	Knowledge of integrating RESTful APIs into mobile apps.
	Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.


Beneficial:


	Experience with native development (iOS/Android).
	Familiarity with backend technologies (Node.js, Firebase) for mobile integrations.
	Understanding of CI/CD pipelines for mobile apps.
	Cloud technologies experience (AWS, GCP) is a plus.


Remuneration
Compensation: N100,000 / Month (Part-Time).

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to:&nbsp;urbanhivejobs@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

  },

    }

}



Mobile React Native - Full Stack Developer Job at Urban Hive Nigeria




        
    

        
        Urban Hive Nigeria is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidate to fill the position below:

Job Position: Mobile React Native - Full Stack Developer

Job Location: Lagos (Remote)
Employment Type: Part-Time

Job Description


	We are looking for a Mobile React Native | Full Stack Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate should have the technical expertise and interpersonal abilities needed to build and maintain high-quality mobile applications.


Requirements
Technical Skills Required:
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Proficiency in React Native for mobile app development (iOS and Android).
	Experience with JavaScript and TypeScript.
	Familiarity with mobile development tools and libraries, such as Expo, Redux, or similar state management solutions.
	Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
	Experience with testing and debugging mobile applications.
	Knowledge of integrating RESTful APIs into mobile apps.
	Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.


Beneficial:


	Experience with native development (iOS/Android).
	Familiarity with backend technologies (Node.js, Firebase) for mobile integrations.
	Understanding of CI/CD pipelines for mobile apps.
	Cloud technologies experience (AWS, GCP) is a plus.


Remuneration
Compensation: N100,000 / Month (Part-Time).

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their Applications to: urbanhivejobs@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Senior Accountant",
  "description": "Brilliant Performance Solutions Limited - Our client&nbsp;is an International Brand in the Hospitality Industry and operates top notched Hotels within the mainland and Island areas of Lagos.

Due to increasing activities, they are&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accountant
Job Locations:&nbsp;Lagos Mainland and Island - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Our client urgently requires the servicers of an experienced Accountant who has a minimum of 5 years&rsquo; experience and must be a Chartered Accountant.
	This person must have also had a minimum of two years&rsquo; experience with a top branded Hotel. It is part of the requirement that this person must have a degree or HND in accounting and good knowledge of hotel operational software


Key Duties &amp; Responsibilities
The responsibilities for this position include the followings:


	Oversee financial reporting processes, including preparation of financial statements, reports, and budgets.
	Ensure compliance with accounting principles, standards, and regulations.
	Manage day-to-day accounting operations, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and payroll.
	Analyze financial data and provide insights to support strategic decision-making.
	Coordinate external audits and tax filings.
	Develop and implement internal controls to safeguard assets and mitigate risks.
	Provide leadership and mentorship to accounting team members.
	Conduct variance analysis and recommend corrective actions.
	Assist with financial planning and forecasting activities.
	Stay updated with changes in accounting standards and regulations.
	Prepare ad hoc financial reports and analyses as needed.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams on finance-related projects.
	Monitor cash flow and liquidity to ensure adequate funding.
	Review and approve journal entries and reconciliations.
	Communicate financial results and recommendations to senior management.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;bphotjobs@gmail.com&nbsp;or&nbsp;jobmasters2020@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Senior Accountant Job at Brilliant Performance Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        Brilliant Performance Solutions Limited - Our client is an International Brand in the Hospitality Industry and operates top notched Hotels within the mainland and Island areas of Lagos.

Due to increasing activities, they are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Accountant
Job Locations: Lagos Mainland and Island - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Our client urgently requires the servicers of an experienced Accountant who has a minimum of 5 years’ experience and must be a Chartered Accountant.
	This person must have also had a minimum of two years’ experience with a top branded Hotel. It is part of the requirement that this person must have a degree or HND in accounting and good knowledge of hotel operational software


Key Duties & Responsibilities
The responsibilities for this position include the followings:


	Oversee financial reporting processes, including preparation of financial statements, reports, and budgets.
	Ensure compliance with accounting principles, standards, and regulations.
	Manage day-to-day accounting operations, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and payroll.
	Analyze financial data and provide insights to support strategic decision-making.
	Coordinate external audits and tax filings.
	Develop and implement internal controls to safeguard assets and mitigate risks.
	Provide leadership and mentorship to accounting team members.
	Conduct variance analysis and recommend corrective actions.
	Assist with financial planning and forecasting activities.
	Stay updated with changes in accounting standards and regulations.
	Prepare ad hoc financial reports and analyses as needed.
	Collaborate with cross-functional teams on finance-related projects.
	Monitor cash flow and liquidity to ensure adequate funding.
	Review and approve journal entries and reconciliations.
	Communicate financial results and recommendations to senior management.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: bphotjobs@gmail.com or jobmasters2020@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Junior Technical Support Engineer",
  "description": "VaultIQ Global Solutions Limited is a UK-registered information technology and cloud engineering company providing advanced solutions in AWS Cloud Security, DevOps Automation, Data Analytics, and Digital Transformation.
We design, build, and manage secure cloud-based business systems for clients in utilities, transport, engineering, environmental services, compliance, and fleet operations. VaultIQ delivers enterprise-grade cloud architecture, system integration, automation, monitoring, and long-term managed services. Our team supports organisations in achieving digital efficiency through modern cloud technologies, automation, analytics, and innovation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Technical Support Engineer&nbsp;

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos (Remote)
Employment Type: Contract
Contract Duration: 4 Years (2 March 2026 &ndash; 1 March 2030)

Job Summary


	VaultIQ Global Solutions Ltd is recruiting a Junior Technical Support Engineer (Remote) to support the implementation and operations of an enterprise Fleet Management System built on cloud technologies.
	This role supports a major long-term contract and requires a reliable junior IT professional who can work independently from home, follow instructions carefully, and maintain accurate technical records.
	The Junior Technical Support Engineer will work directly with the Senior Cloud Engineer to support daily data operations, compliance documents, system checks, and user support.


Key Responsibilities
System Monitoring &amp; Daily Checks


	Perform daily system health checks
	Track fleet asset updates (LCV, HGV, plant, equipment)
	Update driver records and compliance logs
	Monitor off-road vehicles and record status updates


Data Management &amp; Upload Operations


	Prepare and upload CSV/XML/JSON files
	Perform bulk data uploads, corrections, and cleanups
	Maintain accident, incident, fines, and licensing records
	Organise digital documents stored on cloud platforms (AWS S3 / OneDrive)
	Assist with record migration from legacy formats.


Reporting &amp; Documentation:
Assist in generating monthly reports:


	Maintenance compliance
	Forward Maintenance Planner (12-month plan)
	Driver/Operator records
	Asset utilisation reports
	Maintain logs, documentation, and audit records
	Support departmental structure updates and role configurations.


Technical Support &amp; User Assistance:


	Provide remote support to users (email, ticketing tools, chat)
	Log issues, escalate incidents, and track resolutions
	Run routine scripts or tasks assigned by the Senior Engineer
	Test new updates, integrations, and data changes
	Assist in API-based data collection tasks (training provided).


Experience Requirements
1&ndash;3 years of experience in ANY of the following:


	IT support
	Data entry / data operations
	Technical operations
	Admin/technical assistant roles
	NYSC completion is acceptable
	Must be based in Lagos with reliable remote working capability.


Required Skills:


	Basic understanding of IT or cloud concepts
	Strong Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets skills
	Ability to work independently without supervision
	Strong attention to detail and data accuracy
	Good documentation and communication skills
	Ability to follow structured instructions
	Willingness to learn cloud platforms (training provided).


Tools &amp; Platforms You Will Work With:
(Training will be provided for all tools):


	Microsoft Excel / Google Sheets
	CSV / JSON / XML templates
	AWS S3 (basic file storage operations)
	Ticketing systems (Jira, Zoho, or equivalent)
	Microsoft Teams / Outlook / OneDrive
	Smartsheet (basic updates)
	Telematics data files from fleet systems.


Certifications (NOT Mandatory, but an Advantage):


	Basic IT Training Certificate (online or classroom)
	Google IT Support Professional Certificate
	CompTIA IT Fundamentals (ITF+)
	CompTIA A+ (advantage)
	AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (optional)
	Any entry-level IT, data, or support certification.


Remuneration


	N200,000 Monthly Salary
	N50,000 Monthly Allowance (Broadband, Electricity, Stationery)
	Total: N250,000 per month (All-Inclusive).


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;info@vaultiqsolutions.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;Application &ndash; Junior Technical Support Engineer (Remote)&rdquo; as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;This is beginner-friendly and suitable for junior applicants.",

Junior Technical Support Engineer Job at VaultIQ Global Solutions Limited




        
    

        
        VaultIQ Global Solutions Limited is a UK-registered information technology and cloud engineering company providing advanced solutions in AWS Cloud Security, DevOps Automation, Data Analytics, and Digital Transformation.
We design, build, and manage secure cloud-based business systems for clients in utilities, transport, engineering, environmental services, compliance, and fleet operations. VaultIQ delivers enterprise-grade cloud architecture, system integration, automation, monitoring, and long-term managed services. Our team supports organisations in achieving digital efficiency through modern cloud technologies, automation, analytics, and innovation.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Junior Technical Support Engineer 

Job Location: Lagos (Remote)
Employment Type: Contract
Contract Duration: 4 Years (2 March 2026 – 1 March 2030)

Job Summary


	VaultIQ Global Solutions Ltd is recruiting a Junior Technical Support Engineer (Remote) to support the implementation and operations of an enterprise Fleet Management System built on cloud technologies.
	This role supports a major long-term contract and requires a reliable junior IT professional who can work independently from home, follow instructions carefully, and maintain accurate technical records.
	The Junior Technical Support Engineer will work directly with the Senior Cloud Engineer to support daily data operations, compliance documents, system checks, and user support.


Key Responsibilities
System Monitoring & Daily Checks


	Perform daily system health checks
	Track fleet asset updates (LCV, HGV, plant, equipment)
	Update driver records and compliance logs
	Monitor off-road vehicles and record status updates


Data Management & Upload Operations


	Prepare and upload CSV/XML/JSON files
	Perform bulk data uploads, corrections, and cleanups
	Maintain accident, incident, fines, and licensing records
	Organise digital documents stored on cloud platforms (AWS S3 / OneDrive)
	Assist with record migration from legacy formats.


Reporting & Documentation:
Assist in generating monthly reports:


	Maintenance compliance
	Forward Maintenance Planner (12-month plan)
	Driver/Operator records
	Asset utilisation reports
	Maintain logs, documentation, and audit records
	Support departmental structure updates and role configurations.


Technical Support & User Assistance:


	Provide remote support to users (email, ticketing tools, chat)
	Log issues, escalate incidents, and track resolutions
	Run routine scripts or tasks assigned by the Senior Engineer
	Test new updates, integrations, and data changes
	Assist in API-based data collection tasks (training provided).


Experience Requirements
1–3 years of experience in ANY of the following:


	IT support
	Data entry / data operations
	Technical operations
	Admin/technical assistant roles
	NYSC completion is acceptable
	Must be based in Lagos with reliable remote working capability.


Required Skills:


	Basic understanding of IT or cloud concepts
	Strong Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets skills
	Ability to work independently without supervision
	Strong attention to detail and data accuracy
	Good documentation and communication skills
	Ability to follow structured instructions
	Willingness to learn cloud platforms (training provided).


Tools & Platforms You Will Work With:
(Training will be provided for all tools):


	Microsoft Excel / Google Sheets
	CSV / JSON / XML templates
	AWS S3 (basic file storage operations)
	Ticketing systems (Jira, Zoho, or equivalent)
	Microsoft Teams / Outlook / OneDrive
	Smartsheet (basic updates)
	Telematics data files from fleet systems.


Certifications (NOT Mandatory, but an Advantage):


	Basic IT Training Certificate (online or classroom)
	Google IT Support Professional Certificate
	CompTIA IT Fundamentals (ITF+)
	CompTIA A+ (advantage)
	AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner (optional)
	Any entry-level IT, data, or support certification.


Remuneration


	N200,000 Monthly Salary
	N50,000 Monthly Allowance (Broadband, Electricity, Stationery)
	Total: N250,000 per month (All-Inclusive).


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@vaultiqsolutions.com using “Application – Junior Technical Support Engineer (Remote)” as the subject of the email.

Note: This is beginner-friendly and suitable for junior applicants.    

    

        Click here to Apply

  "description": "Daievom Dispenser Water, a producer and supplier of quality premium water, is&nbsp;recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos (Hybrid)

Overview


	We&rsquo;re looking for a bold, persuasive, and relationship-driven Sales Executive who will drive dispenser water sales across offices and corporate buildings.
	Your goal is simple &mdash; get Daievom Water into as many offices as possible while maintaining strong relationships and growing your accounts.


Key Responsibilities


	Visit offices, businesses, and organizations to present Daievom Water and close new accounts.
	Maintain relationships with existing clients, ensuring consistent reorders.
	Achieve and exceed monthly sales targets.
	Identify new business opportunities and negotiate pricing that sustains profitability.
	Work with logistics to ensure seamless supply and client satisfaction.
	Keep accurate daily records of leads, follow-ups, and payments.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	OND / HND / B.Sc in Business, Marketing, or related field is a plus
	2&ndash;3 years of field sales experience (preferably FMCG, beverage, or bottled water).
	Must be confident approaching corporate clients directly.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and time-management skills.


Personal Traits:


	Energetic, bold, and self-motivated.
	Excellent communicator who enjoys meeting people.
	Professional appearance and positive attitude.
	Goal-oriented and thrives under targets.


Compensation


	Competitive base salary. (N120,000 - N150,000 / month.)
	+ Transport allowance


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;daievomrecruitment@gmail.com&nbsp;using &quot;Sales Executive - (their first name)&quot; as the subject of the email.",

Sales Executive Job at Daievom Dispenser Water




        
    

        
        Daievom Dispenser Water, a producer and supplier of quality premium water, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Executive

Job Location: Lagos (Hybrid)

Overview


	We’re looking for a bold, persuasive, and relationship-driven Sales Executive who will drive dispenser water sales across offices and corporate buildings.
	Your goal is simple — get Daievom Water into as many offices as possible while maintaining strong relationships and growing your accounts.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Visit offices, businesses, and organizations to present Daievom Water and close new accounts.
	Maintain relationships with existing clients, ensuring consistent reorders.
	Achieve and exceed monthly sales targets.
	Identify new business opportunities and negotiate pricing that sustains profitability.
	Work with logistics to ensure seamless supply and client satisfaction.
	Keep accurate daily records of leads, follow-ups, and payments.


Qualifications & Experience


	OND / HND / B.Sc in Business, Marketing, or related field is a plus
	2–3 years of field sales experience (preferably FMCG, beverage, or bottled water).
	Must be confident approaching corporate clients directly.
	Strong negotiation, communication, and time-management skills.


Personal Traits:


	Energetic, bold, and self-motivated.
	Excellent communicator who enjoys meeting people.
	Professional appearance and positive attitude.
	Goal-oriented and thrives under targets.


Compensation


	Competitive base salary. (N120,000 - N150,000 / month.)
	+ Transport allowance


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: daievomrecruitment@gmail.com using "Sales Executive - (their first name)" as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply  
        

    
     




        
        

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});

{

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Field Engineer",
  "description": "Pragmatic Technologies Limited is a holding company that has top brand presence in Nigeria: PRAG (a top leading brand for stabilizers, inverters, batteries, solar and other power products). It was incorporated in LAGOS, Nigeria with Registration Number 277126. It was registered on 01 Aug 1995. The official brand of Pragmatic Technologies is PRAG.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Obanikoro, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	To ensure that customer installations and repairs are promptly done according to laid down company procedures.
	To attend to customer needs in a professional manner and ensure that all installation and repair jobs are completed efficiently.


Responsibilities


	Installation of all the inverters and stabilizers with SOP.
	Attend to all faulty service requests that come from customers via the Service Controller.
	Ensure the proper functioning of the product after installation and FSR.
	Ensure proper training of customer on the functionality of the product.
	Liaise with the customer regarding the status of product after installation and FSR.
	Performs other functions as assigned.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND in Engineering or equivalent.
	2 - 3 years of relevant and progressive experience.
	Good business communication (including written and verbal) skills.
	Expert presentation and interpersonal skills.
	Good carriage, professional appearance and outlook to work.
	Strong business ethics


Competencies Required (Plus):
Skills:


	Planning
	Communication
	Leadership
	Troubleshooting/problem solving
	Customer Service
	Good Business communications skills
	Strong interpersonal skills.


Knowledge:


	Electrical Installation
	Electronics repair
	Customer Service
	Product knowledge


Attitude:


	Result Orientation
	Positive Mindset
	Self-Starter
	Hardworking
	Adaptive &amp; Flexible
	Team worker
	Models company ideals.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;application to:&nbsp;hr@prag.global&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note:&nbsp;Only qualified candidates will be contacted.",

Field Engineer Job at Pragmatic Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Pragmatic Technologies Limited is a holding company that has top brand presence in Nigeria: PRAG (a top leading brand for stabilizers, inverters, batteries, solar and other power products). It was incorporated in LAGOS, Nigeria with Registration Number 277126. It was registered on 01 Aug 1995. The official brand of Pragmatic Technologies is PRAG.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Field Engineer
Job Location: Obanikoro, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	To ensure that customer installations and repairs are promptly done according to laid down company procedures.
	To attend to customer needs in a professional manner and ensure that all installation and repair jobs are completed efficiently.


Responsibilities


	Installation of all the inverters and stabilizers with SOP.
	Attend to all faulty service requests that come from customers via the Service Controller.
	Ensure the proper functioning of the product after installation and FSR.
	Ensure proper training of customer on the functionality of the product.
	Liaise with the customer regarding the status of product after installation and FSR.
	Performs other functions as assigned.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND in Engineering or equivalent.
	2 - 3 years of relevant and progressive experience.
	Good business communication (including written and verbal) skills.
	Expert presentation and interpersonal skills.
	Good carriage, professional appearance and outlook to work.
	Strong business ethics


Competencies Required (Plus):
Skills:


	Planning
	Communication
	Leadership
	Troubleshooting/problem solving
	Customer Service
	Good Business communications skills
	Strong interpersonal skills.


Knowledge:


	Electrical Installation
	Electronics repair
	Customer Service
	Product knowledge


Attitude:


	Result Orientation
	Positive Mindset
	Self-Starter
	Hardworking
	Adaptive & Flexible
	Team worker
	Models company ideals.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their application to: hr@prag.global using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.
